name: scorecards
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool live_golf_data.
Tool description: PGA Tour and LIV Tour live golf data for your application needs such as rankings, leaderboards, scorecards, and results.
API description: Fetch a scorecard for a given `tournId`, `year`, `playerId`, and `roundId`.  Scorecards include shot-by-shot granularity.

orgid.description: Identifier for the organization (1 for PGA Tour, 2 for LIV Tour).

roundid.description: Identifier for the round. Defaults to None.
